sentences.en: All that trading and subterfuge is exhausting.
sentences.cn: 所有这些交易和诡计都令人精疲力尽.

sentences.en: Avoid any temptation to employ secrecy or subterfuge in your actions.
sentences.cn: 得避免任何行动中运用诡计的行为,或是对你的行动过度保密.

sentences.en: European carping over the phraseology represented a mixture of hypocrisy and subterfuge.
sentences.cn: 欧洲在措词上找岔子的做法既虚伪又狡诈.

sentences.en: Her claim to is a journalist is simply subterfuge to get into the theatre without pay.
sentences.cn: 她自称是记者,这只是个看戏不买票的花招而已.

sentences.en: Her talent for subterfuge lay hidden behind her sweet, serene smile. She beat them all.
sentences.cn: 她脸上挂着甜甜的 、 圣洁的微笑,却出手老练、隐而不露, 将他们统统打败.

sentences.en: Most people can see right through that type of subterfuge.
sentences.cn: 大多数人能一眼看透这种伎俩。

sentences.en: Since that is impossible , there isn't even any subterfuge involved.
sentences.cn: 但是受宠若惊, 我实在想不出我何德何能.

sentences.en: The Lurker focuses on spies, cloaks and subterfuge to devastate opponents.
sentences.cn: 潜行者专注于使用间谍, 掩饰,和诡计去摧毁敌人.

trans.tran_cn: （用说谎或欺骗以逃脱责备、困难等的）花招，遁词
trans.tran_en: Subterfuge is a trick or a dishonest way of getting what you want
